column1: # Experimental design = 2 crops (M for maize, S for sweet sorghum) x 2 input levels (2 for optimum and 1 for water/nitrogen stress) x 4 replications
# Sowing day = 135 day of year (May 15, 2009), 50% emergence for maize and sorghum May 21 and May 23, 2009, respectivelly
# notes: day 165 and day 173 only one treatment (crop species). Inputs applied after the 2nd harvest.
# notes: day 180 intermediate harvest to capture the explonential phase of growth
#  variable: total above ground dry biomass in Mg/ha
